content:
# I have successfully gathered another 10 iron ore, bringing my inventory back to a total of 10 iron ore.
# Now I can insert this iron ore into the furnace to continue smelting and produce more iron plates.

# I will insert the 10 iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert all 10 iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore into the furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory again.

# I will now wait for the furnace to smelt the iron ore into plates.
for _ in range(30):  # Wait for 30 seconds for the smelting process.
    furnace_status = inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate]  # Check how many iron plates have been produced.
    if furnace_status > 1:  # Check if more than 1 plate has been produced.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # If it times out, raise an exception.

# Check the total number of iron plates produced.
print(f"Total iron plates produced: {inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate]}")  # Display the updated number of iron plates created.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Print current entities on the map.
